pages.text: Miracle cure? Come on, wake up! It's been six months, and every time they mention a miracle cure, apart from that sorry excuse, the spokesperson just keeps saying they're working on it like crazy, but there's no sign of any progress. Even if they are really working on it, if you just Google it, you'll find

out how long it takes to develop a drug! And even if this miracle cure does show up, it's gonna be the rich folks getting it first. So, instead of waiting around for a miracle cure, you might as well use this time to gear yourself up. Get armed and ready.
